generalDescription.type: Preprocess Method. Data Reduction. Prototype Generation. Noise Filter.
generalDescription.objective: Reduce the size of the training set without losing precision or accuracy in order to a posterior classification
generalDescription.howWork: First, extract into resulting set a number of prototypes randomly of the set. Later, it executes a desired number of iterations. In each iteration, picks up a randomly prototype of the resulting set, and modifies its nearest neighbor into the resulting set, rewarding it if has got the same class, and penalizing in the other chase. Rewarding process: m_c = m_c + alpha * (x - m_c) Penalizing process: m_c = m_c - alpha * (x - m_c)

parameterSpec.param: Number of iterations: Integer value. Number of iterations of the algorithm.
Percentage of prototypes: Real value. Desired size of the resulting set as percentage of training set size.
Alpha0: Double value. Alpha constant in [0, 1].
